sub_title: 🚀 Giving super powers to retailers and brands with dynamic pricing @ Omnia Retail
summary:
I am a passionate and curious person, full of energy and drive. These traits have empowered me to quickly master new skills and quickly adapt to different environments.

I am results driven and familiar with working in high stress, dynamic environments. A challenge junkie, I obsessively aim for the impossible. I do this by moving fast, focusing on key results and quickly adapting to new insights. 

I have been fortunate to live abroad, completing an internship in New Zealand and my master’s degree in Sweden. I continued working for Spargle as a Project Manager 30 hours per week while studying fulltime for my master’s degree. This is when developed my intercultural communication skills, learned to be resilient and gained new perspectives.

I like hitting the ground running – getting stuff done with a big smile is what I do. When I'm not working. I love to connect with people, go to the cinema, travel and let my inner geek out and play video games.

school.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

profile_positions.description:
Dedicated Senior Enterprise Customer Success Manager, focused on supporting and nurturing our enterprise customer base. My passion lies in helping our valued clients thrive, ensuring they get the most out of our products and services. I take pride in fostering strong client relationships and striving to deliver exceptional value.

Key Skills & Achievements:
- Proven track record in helping enterprise clients maximize the benefits of our offerings.
- Skilled in crafting strategic account plans to align with customer objectives.
- Experienced in identifying opportunities for growth and expansion within our enterprise customer base.
- Proficient in analyzing customer feedback to drive continuous product enhancements.
- A collaborative team player, dedicated to delivering seamless customer support for our enterprise clients.
- Committed to maintaining high customer retention rates within our enterprise customer segment.
- Consistently working to exceed customer satisfaction goals while focusing on our enterprise clientele.
profile_positions.title: Senior / Enterprise Customer Success Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities my role are:

- Being the strategic partner and trusted advisor for Omnia customers, ensuring customers achieve value (ROI) out of our product;
- Driving renewals by making sure customers achieve value through the Omnia product
- Identifying and realizing up- and cross-selling among existing customers
- Creating brand advocates and shareable success cases
- Continuously tracking customer health, performing strategy sessions & Executive Business Reviews (EBRs), building up a relationship & partnership with our customers on a business owner level
- Being an advocate of customer success and driving Omnia -wide adoption of its importance
- Continuously optimizing customer life cycle and Customer Success Management (CSM) processes and sharing valuable insights to product, development, sales & marketing
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Manager

profile_positions.description:
Omnia Retail is the company behind Europe's first dynamic pricing software. Built by two industry experts — one a retail software engineer, the other a retail strategy consultant — Omnia was created to help each founder’s respective clients achieve more with their pricing. Omnia’s mission is to help retailers and brands take control of their pricing and grow profitably with automation and insights, and the enterprise-ready software makes it easy for teams to manage pricing without the need for IT.

At Omnia, I mainly work in the Sales and Customer Success team.
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Consultant

profile_positions.description: While living in Melbourne I supported Vollie as a volunteer in their operations.
profile_positions.title: Operations Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Spargle is a networking agency specialized in IT, E-commerce and digital. The company’s most important objectives are recruitment activities, building teams and managing digital (agile) transformation projects. Spargle only recruits via referrals. 

• I supported clients such as Nike, Heineken, KLM and Albert Heijn in their efforts to transform their organizations to be more agile. I first assessed their company culture, structure and processes, and then collaboratively facilitated the required change. I did this by connecting professionals from within our network, consulting on the Scrum methodology or helping to re-design existing teams to achieve a continuous delivery process and cultural change. This embedded and wholistic approach was crucial to the success of the transformation. 

• As Account Lead I was responsible for complex stakeholder engagement. I directly reported to the directors or higher management. Working co-located empowered me to quickly build enduring relationships and become a sparring partner for my clients. By not only listening but also by questioning and challenging I gained a good understanding of their needs and always made sure I assisted in finding the right solution.
profile_positions.title: Account Lead

profile_positions.description:
• I was in charge of our UXHub, which was responsible for an overall employee experience strategy within the HR department of KLM. My responsibilities were keeping track of the progress and making sure there was a consistent implementation of the strategy. I also made sure the important stakeholders were aligned and monitored the strategy was in line with the HR digital transformation requirements. 

•  Spargle is continuously searching for talent and potential candidates. Interviewing candidates and making sure they were the right fit for our high standards was an important task for me. Spargle has a very personal approach, going beyond what candidates look like on paper and putting effort into understanding who they are as a person. This has greatly helped me to develop my soft skills, listening to what is not said, paying attention to more subtle things like body language and probing deeper to gain more insights. This helped me not only in interviews but also in my stakeholder management and coaching of our freelancers both in personal growth and difficulties in the workplace.

• Spargle is a Dutch agency, which is why we had a lack of international professionals in our network. Because I have a personal interest in intercultural collaboration and had lived in Sweden and New-Zealand, I took it as a challenge to expand our international network. I hosted events, built relationships and made sure our documents were translated. As a result, we were able to build a lasting international network and expand our international clientele.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Albert Heijn to Go is a part of Ahold Delhaize, the largest supermarket chain in the Netherlands and Belgium with net sales of €16.5 billion in 2018. 

• I worked as a fulltime intern within the marketing team of AH to Go. Supported the team with activities like instore communication, contact with bloggers and producing vlogs of the company. In the evenings and weekends, I was working on my thesis for my bachelor degree. It was important for me to both work and write my thesis as I wanted a head start in a business environment and invest in my network by doing things a little differently. The hard work paid off as I gained valuable business experience and completed my thesis in time with a grade of 8,5/10. 

• During my internship the brand started to develop the AH to Go App. I supported the manager by keeping track of the timeline, uploading images and maintaining contact with the development agency for smaller tasks. I was very lucky to be a part of this development, as during this period I discovered my love for digital project management. 

• After completing my internship, I briefly stayed on for a small project in supporting the relaunch of the website, I helped with the branding, finding the right images and writing SEO texts.
profile_positions.title: Marketing coordinator - AH to Go (Internship)

profile_positions.description:
Dream Au Pair is a full-service agency connecting Au Pairs and host families. 

• I chose to go to New-Zealand to do my internship to challenge my personal development. During my time at Dream Au Pair I was responsible for organizing events and orientations. I was also in charge of all the social media activities. This period in my life was the starting point for my love to go abroad and learn from new cultures, not giving up easily and challenging myself to be a little better every day.
profile_positions.title: Event & social coordinator
